response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value to both parties involved. Given its worth to you, I propose to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant discount compared to the market value of $1,500,000, aiming to secure a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your expectations and budget.", "product_price": 1200000}
